vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.12
§ Elzabad = "God has given"
1) a Gadite warrior who aided David
2) a Korhite Levite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   guerrero; tribu de Gad; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   hijo de Semaías; portero; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利薩巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已賜與"
1) 幫助大衛的一位迦得勇士 (代上 12:12)
2) 一位可拉家族的利未人 (代上 26:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利萨巴 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已赐与"
1) 帮助大卫的一位迦得勇士 (代上 12:12)
2) 一位可拉家族的利未人 (代上 26:7)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.7;
son of: Shemaiah (H8098I);
brother of: Othni (H6273), Rephael (H7501), Obed (H5744J), Elihu (H0453I) and Semachiah (H5565)
§ Elzabad = "God has given"
1) a Gadite warrior who aided David
2) a Korhite Levite
